Over 700 hours into the game it's been a consistent grind. CS:GO is an overall great competitive shooter, but it is plagued by hackers/smurfs that will forever ruin the game unless a better anti-cheat is implemented into the game. 



Pros: 

- not graphically demanding
- fun to play with friends

Cons:

- amount of hackers/smurfs
- wish 128 tick was an option for competitive
- devs focus more so on cases/skins rather than anti cheat updates
- toxic kids EVERYWHERE!!
Um classico, nunca saira de moda

This game requires practice in the same way you would practice football, and if you don't practice you're bad, and if you're bad everyone hates, and everyone hates you, you hate you. I just wanted to run around and shoot stuff. If that's what you're looking for save yourself $500 that you'll throw at skins and look into the other FPS games out there, this just isn't worth your money unless you ARE the best.

Хорошая физика в игре. Поменьше бы читеров было бы 10/10. Вчера забанили 5к игроков. Молодцы. Отлично справляетесь советую денег не жалейте. Продукция Valve всему голова. Покупайте и играть на здоровье.
Удачи компании Valve в продажах. И да обновите античит VAC.
